General.Name: Inner Mongolia Yitai Coal Co. Ltd
General.Description: Inner Mongolia Yitai Coal Co., Ltd.,together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mining, production, transportation, and sale of coal products in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Coal, Coal-Related Chemical, and Transportation. The company provides road and railway passenger and freight transportation services; coal-related chemical products and oil products; and supply chain management services. In addition, it is involved in the international trade; goods storage and loading of goods; infrastructure municipal administration; research and development; oil and coal quality testing; fund investment and investment management; and chemical production and sale activities. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Ordos, the People's Republic of China. Inner Mongolia Yitai Coal Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Inner Mongolia Yitai Group Company Limited.

2.Name: Mr. Rong  Jin
2.Title: CFO, Head of Accounting Department & Chief Accounting Officer
